rushEvents.name: Central Campus Info Session
rushEvents.description: Come learn about Theta Tau at our Central Campus Info Session! You are not required to go to both info sessions.

rushEvents.name: North Campus Info Session
rushEvents.description: Come learn about Theta Tau at our North Campus Info Session! You are not required to go to both info sessions.

rushEvents.name: Cider & Donuts
rushEvents.description: Enjoy cider and donuts while meeting brothers!

rushEvents.name: Professional Development Overview
rushEvents.description: Come meet our professional development panel and learn about Theta Tau's professional benefits!  Bring your resume for critiquing~

rushEvents.name: Philanthropy Event
rushEvents.description: Learn about Theta Tau's Philanthropy Committee through a hands-on philanthropy event!
